QuestData.Title: Reclaiming Property
QuestData.Description: You are attracted by a low green glow to the container. Inside there is a glowing bundle of herbs that was most likely stolen from the overgrowth below.$b$bIt would be best to collect all of these so the saberon don't continue their dabbling in plant magic and irritating the nearby magnaron.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find $1oa Herb Bundles in saberon stashes at Steamscar Rise.
QuestData.CompletionText: The saberon should definitely NOT have any of the herbs you have found!
QuestData.RewardText: A good catch discovering those herbs $p. We cannot allow them to continue using these. Who knows what it might set off.
